text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

I would like to officially
welcome the Class of 2021.
[APPLAUSE]
We are so glad you are here.

This is going to be
a great experience

and I hope a
transformational journey

from the incipient
leader you are today

to the leader you hope to become
and the leader the world needs
you to be.

So you might wonder, what is
this magical thing that people

talk about that is a
transformational experience?

We believe that leadership
is about knowing, doing,
and being.
It's knowing yourself.

It's developing your
sense of character.

It's understanding
yourself well.

It's working to leverage
other people around you

to make a good
decision, as opposed

to just feeling
that in every case,

I have to make the
best decision myself.

Make sure to use what
this place can do,

which is to actually form
relationships that you would
otherwise be unlikely to do.
And be ready to be surprised.

There are many avenues
to pursue here.

It's important to
explore, to keep

an open mind to new
adventures and perspectives
and to take risks.

Don't forget those
who got you here.

Keep them top of mind and
seek out moments of gratitude.

And third, and most importantly,
enjoy each other's company.

Be cognizant that we all come
from different walks of life

with widely varying
life experiences.

But it is a common
kindness, mutual respect,

and understanding of differences
that is the glue that
holds this community together.

You will learn as much
from your peers and as much

from the differences
that you have

with your peers as you will
learn anything about any matter
yourself.

You'll want to be able
to take those differences

and turn them into sources
of creativity and imagination
and ultimate economic value.

Why you want to be a leader,
the way in which you want

to be a leader, your own
sense of being as a leader,

understanding how people
experience you as a leader,

the farther you get in
these ways, the more likely

this is to be a transformational
educational experience for you.
[APPLAUSE]
